By Article 295 of the Treaty of Versailles, the signatory powers agreed to bring the Convention into foroe, and for this purpose to enact the necessary legislation without delay and in any case within a period of twelve months from the coming into foroe of the treaty It is necessary therefore that the Bill should be passed during the present Session and I propose to introduce it immediately.E.S,21.4.20.S.P.0.45.
